borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
description:
Construction of a first
floor side extension
decision_conditions:
All proposed windows located on the side
elevation of the development shall be finished in obscure-glaze and non-opening below 1.7m above floor level.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

  • Existing and Proposed Side Elevation A (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/009, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed First Floor Plans (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/006, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed 3D Views (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/004, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed Block Plans (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/003, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed Rear Elevations (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/007, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Site Location Plan (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/002, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed Front Elevations  (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/008, dated: 22/03/2024)
  • Existing and Proposed Side Elevation B (drawing number: DPB/BD/P/010, dated: 22/03/2024)

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
